attributes.action: UK put pressure on Burma to stop Genocide, Ethnic Cleansing of Rohingya Muslims.
attributes.additional_details: People are dying,  lives are being lost as the world stands by.  We need to stop human suffering by putting pressure on Burma to end this Genocide, Ethnic Cleansing & Crimes against Humanity.  A lot of pressure can be put on by Sanctions, Crimes against Humanity charges for those involved at the International Criminal Tribunal to answer charges of Crimes against Humanity and a possible risk of military intervention and creation of safe haven within Burma for the Rohingya Muslim ethnic minority
attributes.background:
Genocide, Ethnic Cleansing & Crimes against Humanity are taking place in Burma as the Rohingya Muslim ethnic minority are killed, burned alive, hacked to death by the Buddhist majority. 
 
World government are doing absolutely nothing, not even cutting off diplomatic ties with Burma in protest.
